choices.text:
### Human:
explain use of Large Language Models (LLM) in AI research
### Assistant:

Large language models, or LLMs for short are a type of artificial neural network that have been trained on large amounts of text data. They can be used to generate new text and speech based on input prompts provided by the user. These systems have become increasingly popular in recent years as they offer an effective way to perform natural language processing tasks such as machine translation, text summarization or dialogue response generation.
